welcome_message_title: Welcome to San Carlos de Bariloche
welcome_message_body: Welcome to San Carlos de Bariloche, a charming city nestled in the Andes mountains and known for its stunning natural beauty and delicious chocolate. We invite you to explore and enjoy all that this picturesque destination has to offer.
